pullRequest.title: (CDAP-16784) Improve kryo serialization for Schema
pullRequest.bodyText: Properly traversing the Schema structure for serialization instead of using json string to reduce the serialized size

commit.message:
(CDAP-16784) Improve kryo serialization for Schema

- Properly traversing the Schema structure for serialization instead of using json string to reduce the serialized size

nodes.bodyText: Would it make sense to add a unit test that checks the size of the serialized object to make sure we dont regress later on?
